attributes.action: Call for the government to reinstate the National Citizen Service (NCS)
attributes.additional_details: Reinstating NCS fosters youth development, builds essential life skills, and promotes social cohesion. It addresses challenges like mental health and unemployment while benefiting communities through social action. Proven to deliver economic and social value, NCS is a vital investment in the nation's future.
attributes.background: Continue to Fund NCS programmes for future generations of young people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Save the National Citizens Service
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701592
